RequireAdminToTurnAirPortOnOff.title: Require Admin Credentials for Wi-Fi Power
RequireAdminToTurnAirPortOnOff.description: If true, requires administrator authorization to turn Wi-Fi on or off.

RequireAdminForAirPortNetworkChange.title: Require Admin Credentials for Wi-Fi Network Change
RequireAdminForAirPortNetworkChange.description: If true, requires administrator authorization for network changes.

RequireAdminForIBSS.title: Require Admin Credentials for IBSS
RequireAdminForIBSS.description: If true, requires administrator authorization to enable IBSS.
